section.heading: Transfer; assignment; assumption of other powers; duties.

annotations.annotation: Section 2(b)(3)(B) of D.C. Law 14-188 provided that the repeal of subsec. (d) shall apply as of September 11, 1998.

Section 33(b)(2) of D.C. Law 12-144 provided that § 30(b)(1) subsec. (b)(1) of this section shall take effect on the latter of: (A) September 11, 1998; or (B) the Dates determined by the Board, but not later than one year after the initial meeting of the Board.

Section 33(b)(1) of D.C. Law 12-144 provided that § 30(a)(1) subsec. (a)(1) of this section shall take effect on the latter of: (A) September 11, 1998; or (B) the Dates determined by the Board, but not later than one year after the initial meeting of the Board.

For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2 of National Capital Revitalization Corporation Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-140, October 23, 2001, 48 DCR 9934).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2 of National Capital Revitalization Corporation Emergency Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-114, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7649).
For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 2 of the National Capital Revitalization Corporation Temporary Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Law 14-53, Dec. 6, 2001, law notification 48 DCR 10807).
